TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Collation extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies whether a printer collates output when it prints multiple copies of a multi-page print job.

span.span: Specifies whether a printer collates output when it prints multiple copies of a multi-page print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准打印机通常逐份打印输出通过打印每个页上的第一个副本，然后第二个副本和等等的每一页。A standard printer typically collates output by printing every page of the first copy, then every page of the second copy, and so on. 当标准打印机不逐份打印时，它将打印第一页上，每个副本，请每个复制的第二页上，依次类推。When a standard printer does not collate, it prints every copy of the first page, then every copy of the second page, and so on. 某些打印机是专门配备有整理箱。这些特别配制的打印机的打印顺序可能不同于那些标准打印机;但是结果是相同的： 多页打印作业的每个副本而不进行手动排序包含正确的序列中所有页面。Some printers are specially equipped with collating bins. The printing sequence for these specially equipped printers may differ from those of standard printers; however the outcome is the same: each copy of a multi-paged print job contains all its pages in the proper sequence without manual sorting. 主要用于以下目的使用此类型的值。Use the values of this type primarily for the following purposes. - 作为的成员回收，这是一个属性的，这些值表示打印机支持的输出的类型。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the type of output that the printer supports. （许多打印机都支持这两种类型）。(Many printers support both types.) - 值作为属性的，该值指示打印机是否逐份打印。As the value of the property of a , the value instructs the printer whether to collate. **未知**属性中永远不会使用值对象。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 绝不应设置属性设置为**未知**。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果某一其他生成应用程序已创建*PrintTicket 文档*排序规则功能设置为一个无法识别排序规则选项，则构造与在应用程序中的对象该文档将具有**未知**的值作为属性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the collation feature to an unrecognized collation option, then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 尽管并类不能被继承，可以扩展[打印架构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)识别并不表示中的打印设备功能或类。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息请参阅[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 打印架构和创建新的打印系统类扩展](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试打印机的功能和配置打印作业，以充分利用它们。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure a print job to take advantage of them. .. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Collated = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Uncollated = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
